users.tableSchema: CREATE TABLE users (id varchar(42) PRIMARY KEY, github_id integer NOT NULL, display_name text NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Expresser',avatar_url text NOT NULL,bio text);
users.insertionScript: INSERT INTO users(id, github_id, display_name, avatar_url) VALUES('palpriyanshu', '58025838','Priyanshu','avatar_url'),('shiviraj', '58025059', 'Shivam Rajputh', 'url2')

stories.tableSchema: CREATE TABLE stories (id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,written_by varchar(42) NOT NULL,state varchar(9) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'drafted',title text NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Untitled Story',content text,cover_image text,last_modified timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,  FOREIGN KEY (written_by) REFERENCES users(id),  CHECK (state IN ('drafted','published')));
stories.insertionScript: INSERT INTO stories(written_by, state, title, content, last_modified) VALUES  ('palpriyanshu', 'published', 'title1','[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You might be wondering where the REST attribute comes in."}}]','2020-07-23 09:24:18'),('palpriyanshu', 'drafted', 'title2','[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You might be wondering where the REST attribute comes in."}}]','2020-07-23 09:24:18'),('shiviraj', 'drafted', 'title3','[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You might be wondering where the REST attribute comes in."}}]','2019-08-23 09:24:18')

tags.tableSchema: CREATE TABLE tags ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, tag_on integer NOT NULL, tag varchar(50) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (tag_on) REFERENCES stories(id) );
tags.insertionScript: INSERT INTO tags (tag_on, tag) VALUES (3, 'go green'), (5, 'romance'), (6, 'love kills'), (8, 'hacking');
